00021 inline
00022 arma_ostream_state::arma_ostream_state(const std::ostream& o)
00023   : orig_flags    (o.flags())
00024   , orig_precision(o.precision())
00025   , orig_width    (o.width())
00026   , orig_fill     (o.fill())
00027   {
00028   }

00031 
00032 inline
00033 void
00034 arma_ostream_state::restore(std::ostream& o) const
00035   {
00036   o.flags    (orig_flags);
00037   o.precision(orig_precision);
00038   o.width    (orig_width);
00039   o.fill     (orig_fill);
00040   }

00048 
00049 template<typename eT>
00050 inline
00051 u32
00052 arma_ostream::modify_stream(std::ostream& o, const eT* data, const u32 n_elem)
00053   {
00054   o.unsetf(ios::showbase);
00055   o.unsetf(ios::uppercase);
00056   o.unsetf(ios::showpos);
00057   
00058   o.fill(' ');
00059   
00060   u32 cell_width;
00061   
00062   bool use_layout_B = false;
00063   bool use_layout_C = false;
00064   
00065   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00066     {
00067     const eT val = data[i];
00068     
00069     if(
00070       val >= eT(+100) ||
00071       ( (is_signed<eT>::value == true) && (val <= eT(-100)) ) ||
00072       ( (is_non_integral<eT>::value == true) && (val > eT(0)) && (val <= eT(+1e-4)) ) ||
00073       ( (is_non_integral<eT>::value == true) && (is_signed<eT>::value == true) && (val < eT(0)) && (val >= eT(-1e-4)) ) 
00074       )
00075       {
00076       use_layout_C = true;
00077       break;
00078       }
00079       
00080     if(
00081       (val >= eT(+10)) || ( (is_signed<eT>::value == true) && (val <= eT(-10)) )
00082       )
00083       {
00084       use_layout_B = true;
00085       }
00086     }
00087   
00088   if(use_layout_C == true)
00089     {
00090     o.setf(ios::scientific);
00091     o.unsetf(ios::fixed);
00092     o.precision(4);
00093     cell_width = 13;
00094     }
00095   else
00096   if(use_layout_B == true)
00097     {
00098     o.unsetf(ios::scientific);
00099     o.setf(ios::fixed);
00100     o.precision(4);
00101     cell_width = 10;
00102     }
00103   else
00104     {
00105     o.unsetf(ios::scientific);
00106     o.setf(ios::fixed);
00107     o.precision(4);
00108     cell_width = 9;
00109     }
00110   
00111   return cell_width;
00112   }
00113 
00114 
00115 
00116 //! "better than nothing" settings for complex numbers
00117 template<typename T>
00118 inline
00119 u32
00120 arma_ostream::modify_stream(std::ostream& o, const std::complex<T>* data, const u32 n_elem)
00121   {
00122   o.unsetf(ios::showbase);
00123   o.unsetf(ios::uppercase);
00124   o.fill(' ');
00125   
00126   o.setf(ios::scientific);
00127   o.setf(ios::showpos);
00128   o.unsetf(ios::fixed);
00129   
00130   u32 cell_width;
00131   
00132   o.precision(3);
00133   cell_width = 2 + 2*(1 + 3 + o.precision() + 5) + 1;
00134 
00135   return cell_width;
00136   }

00140 //! Print an element to the specified stream
00141 template<typename eT>
00142 arma_inline
00143 void
00144 arma_ostream::print_elem(std::ostream& o, const eT& x)
00145   {
00146   o << x;
00147   }
00148 
00149 
00150 
00151 //! Print a complex element to the specified stream
00152 //! EXPERIMENTAL !
00153 template<typename T>
00154 arma_inline
00155 void
00156 arma_ostream::print_elem(std::ostream& o, const std::complex<T>& x)
00157   {
00158   std::ostringstream ss;
00159   ss.flags(o.flags());
00160   //ss.imbue(o.getloc());
00161   ss.precision(o.precision());
00162 
00163   ss << '(' << x.real() << ',' << x.imag() << ')';
00164 
00165   o << ss.str();
00166   }

00169 
00170 //! Print a matrix to the specified stream
00171 template<typename eT>
00172 inline
00173 void
00174 arma_ostream::print(std::ostream& o, const Mat<eT>& m, const bool modify)
00175   {
00176   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00177   
00178   const arma_ostream_state stream_state(o);
00179 
00180   u32 cell_width;
00181   
00182   if(modify == true)
00183     {
00184     cell_width = arma_ostream::modify_stream(o, m.memptr(), m.n_elem);
00185     }
00186   else
00187     {
00188     cell_width = o.width();  // copy the user's cell width
00189     }
00190   
00191   if(cell_width > 0)
00192     {
00193     for(u32 row=0; row < m.n_rows; ++row)
00194       {
00195       for(u32 col=0; col < m.n_cols; ++col)
00196         {
00197         // the cell width appears to be reset after each element is printed,
00198         // hence we need to restore it
00199         o.width(cell_width);
00200         arma_ostream::print_elem(o, m.at(row,col));
00201         }
00202       
00203       o << '\n';
00204       }
00205     }
00206   else
00207     {
00208     for(u32 row=0; row < m.n_rows; ++row)
00209       {
00210       for(u32 col=0; col < m.n_cols-1; ++col)
00211         {
00212         arma_ostream::print_elem(o, m.at(row,col));
00213         o << ' ';
00214         }
00215       
00216       arma_ostream::print_elem(o, m.at(row, m.n_cols-1));
00217       o << '\n';
00218       }
00219     }
00220   
00221   o.flush();
00222   stream_state.restore(o);
00223   }
00224

00226 
00227 //! Print a cube to the specified stream
00228 template<typename eT>
00229 inline
00230 void
00231 arma_ostream::print(std::ostream& o, const Cube<eT>& x, const bool modify)
00232   {
00233   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00234   
00235   const arma_ostream_state stream_state(o);
00236 
00237   u32 cell_width;
00238   
00239   if(modify == true)
00240     {
00241     cell_width = arma_ostream::modify_stream(o, x.memptr(), x.n_elem);
00242     }
00243   else
00244     {
00245     cell_width = o.width();
00246     }
00247   
00248   for(u32 slice=0; slice < x.n_slices; ++slice)
00249     {
00250     o << "[cube slice " << slice << ']' << '\n';
00251     o.width(cell_width);
00252     arma_ostream::print(o, x.slice(slice), false);
00253     o << '\n';
00254     }
00255 
00256   stream_state.restore(o);
00257   }

00262 //! Print a field to the specified stream
00263 //! Assumes type oT can be printed, i.e. oT has std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream&, const oT&) 
00264 template<typename oT>
00265 inline
00266 void
00267 arma_ostream::print(std::ostream& o, const field<oT>& x)
00268   {
00269   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00270   
00271   const arma_ostream_state stream_state(o);
00272 
00273   const std::streamsize cell_width = o.width();
00274 
00275   for(u32 col=0; col<x.n_cols; ++col)
00276     {
00277     o << "[field column " << col << ']' << '\n'; 
00278     for(u32 row=0; row<x.n_rows; ++row)
00279       {
00280       o.width(cell_width);
00281       o << x.at(row,col) << '\n';
00282       }
00283     
00284     o << '\n';
00285     }
00286   
00287   o.flush();
00288   stream_state.restore(o);
00289   }

00293 //! Print a subfield to the specified stream
00294 //! Assumes type oT can be printed, i.e. oT has std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream&, const oT&) 
00295 template<typename oT>
00296 inline
00297 void
00298 arma_ostream::print(std::ostream& o, const subview_field<oT>& x)
00299   {
00300   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00301   
00302   const arma_ostream_state stream_state(o);
00303   
00304   const std::streamsize cell_width = o.width();
00305   
00306   for(u32 col=0; col<x.n_cols; ++col)
00307     {
00308     o << "[subfield column " << col << ']' << '\n'; 
00309     for(u32 row=0; row<x.n_rows; ++row)
00310       {
00311       o.width(cell_width);
00312       o << x.at(row,col) << '\n';
00313       }
00314     
00315     o << '\n';
00316     }
00317   
00318   o.flush();
00319   stream_state.restore(o);
00320   }
